Entity.Description: This table stores order approval rules
Entity.Name: Order_Approval_Rule

Attribute.Description: This is the reference to the validation identifier corresponding to base business rules.
Attribute.Name: Validation_Key

Attribute.Description: The primary key of the YFS_ORDER_APPROVAL_RULE table.
Attribute.Name: Order_Approval_Rule_Key

Attribute.Description: The organization that is associated with this approval rule.
Attribute.Name: Organization_Code

Attribute.Description: Document type to which this approval rule belongs.
Attribute.Name: Document_Type

Attribute.Description: Approval rule identifier.
Attribute.Name: Rule_ID

Attribute.Description: Indicates whether approval limit is defined for header level or line level.
Attribute.Name: Type

Attribute.Description: The Greex format advanced XML condition associated with this approval limit.
Attribute.Name: Greex_Rule

Attribute.Description: Indicates when the approval overrides other applicable rules of the same Type
Attribute.Name: Is_Override

Attribute.Description: Indicates when the approval rule is active.
Attribute.Name: Is_Active

Attribute.Description: Defines the time after which the rule is effective.
Attribute.Name: Effective_Start_Date

Attribute.Description: Defines the time before which the rule is effective.
Attribute.Name: Effective_End_Date

Attribute.Description: Message to be displayed when approval rule is violated.
Attribute.Name: Message

Attribute.Description: Message code to be displayed when approval rule is violated.
Attribute.Name: Message_Code

Attribute.Description: The channel for which this rule applies.
Attribute.Name: Channel

Attribute.Description: The Lane for which this rule applies.
Attribute.Name: Lane_Type

Attribute.Description: The Store for which this rule applies.
Attribute.Name: Store_Type

Attribute.Description: The region for which this rule applies.
Attribute.Name: Region_Key

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the creation of this record.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the last modification of this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: The user who created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: The user who last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: The program that created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: The program that modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Entity.Description: This table stores order approval plans
Entity.Name: Approval_Plan

Attribute.Description: The primary key of the YFS_APPROVAL_PLAN table.
Attribute.Name: Approval_Plan_Key

Attribute.Description: The organization that is associated with this approval plan.
Attribute.Name: Organization_Code

Attribute.Description: Indicates the sequence of the approval.
Attribute.Name: Sequence

Attribute.Description: Team which has to approve the document.
Attribute.Name: Team_Code

Attribute.Description: User group which has to approve the document.
Attribute.Name: User_Group_ID

Attribute.Description: The approval group to which this approval plan belongs to.
Attribute.Name: Approval_Group_Key

Attribute.Description: Indicates the predecessor sequences which needs to provide approval first before this team/user group can approve. Multiple predecessors can be stored by specifying comma separated sequences.
Attribute.Name: Predecessor_Seq

Attribute.Description: Indicates if the approval is mandatory and is required regardless of the hierarchy.
Attribute.Name: Is_Mandatory

Attribute.Description: This attribute indicates a name for this approval plan.
Attribute.Name: Approval_Name

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the creation of this record.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the last modification of this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: The user who created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: The user who last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: The program that created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: The program that modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Entity.Description: The approval group table defines the approval group plans to be used for order approval
Entity.Name: Approval_Group

Attribute.Description: The primary key of the YFS_APPROVAL_GROUP table.
Attribute.Name: Approval_Group_Key

Attribute.Description: The organization that is associated with this approval group.
Attribute.Name: Organization_Code

Attribute.Description: Document type to which this approval group belongs.
Attribute.Name: Document_Type

Attribute.Description: Identifier for this approval group.
Attribute.Name: Approval_Group_Id

Attribute.Description: The name of this approval group.
Attribute.Name: Approval_Group_Name

Attribute.Description: Indicates if this approval group is the default approval group for order approval.
Attribute.Name: Is_Default

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the creation of this record.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the last modification of this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: The user who created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: The user who last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: The program that created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: The program that modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Entity.Description: This tables stores the relationship between approval rules and approval groups.
Entity.Name: Approval_Rule_Assoc

Attribute.Description: The primary key of the YFS_APPROVAL_RULE_ASSOC table.
Attribute.Name: Approval_Rule_Assoc_Key

Attribute.Description: The foreign key of the order approval rule associated with.
Attribute.Name: Order_Approval_Rule_Key

Attribute.Description: The foreign key of the approval group associated to.
Attribute.Name: Approval_Group_Key

Attribute.Description: Indicates the lowest approver in the approval plan sequence that can approve the exception.
Attribute.Name: Min_Approver

Attribute.Description: Indicates the highest approver in the approval plan sequence that can approve the exception.
Attribute.Name: Max_Approver

Attribute.Description: Indicates in case exception is caused by a person higher or equal to Min Approver role, the system will enforce minimum of self signature as approval mechanism.
Attribute.Name: Is_Signature_Mandatory

Attribute.Description: Indicates if approval signature is required by every one in the approval plan sequence or approval by any one in the approval plan sequence.
Attribute.Name: Signature_Policy

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the creation of this record.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the last modification of this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: The user who created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: The user who last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: The program that created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: The program that modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Entity.Description: Table for storing violations that occur during a transaction.
Entity.Name: Transaction_Violation

Attribute.Description: Primary Key attribute of YFS_TRANSACTION_VIOLATION.
Attribute.Name: Transaction_Violation_Key

Attribute.Description: ID of Approval Rule that caused violation.
Attribute.Name: Approval_Rule_ID

Attribute.Description: Organization Code of org that owns the rule.
Attribute.Name: Organization_Code

Attribute.Description: Document Type of the rule.
Attribute.Name: Document_Type

Attribute.Description: The Validation that this the rule belongs to.
Attribute.Name: Validation_ID

Attribute.Description: Domain of the corresponding Validation.
Attribute.Name: Domain

Attribute.Description: Message code to be displayed when approval rule is violated.
Attribute.Name: Message_Code

Attribute.Description: The Reference to the transaction that resulted in a violation.
Attribute.Name: Transaction_Info_ID

Attribute.Description: Number to identify the violation sequence within a transaction.
Attribute.Name: Sequence_Number

Attribute.Description: The status of the violation.
Attribute.Name: Status

Attribute.Description: This field is used internally by the system to signal that a Violation's References need to be updated to reflect changes.
Attribute.Name: Refresh_References

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was created.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was last modified.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: User who created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: User who modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: Program that created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: Program that modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Entity.Description: Table for storing transaction information that resulted in violations.
Entity.Name: Transaction_Info

Attribute.Description: Primary Key attribute of YFS_TRANSACTION_INFO.
Attribute.Name: Transaction_Info_Key

Attribute.Description: UserID of the initiator of the transaction.
Attribute.Name: Performed_By

Attribute.Description: API/Service call that resulted in the violations.
Attribute.Name: Service_Name

Attribute.Description: The Input_XML of the API Call.
Attribute.Name: Input_XML

Attribute.Description: Unique ID of Transaction.
Attribute.Name: Transaction_Info_ID

Attribute.Description: The status of the violation.
Attribute.Name: Status

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was created.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was last modified.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: User who created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: User who modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: Program that created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: Program that modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Entity.Description: Table for storing additional reference information for identifying violations.
Entity.Name: Transaction_Violation_Reference

Attribute.Description: Primary Key attribute of YFS_TRANSACTION_VIOLATION_REFERENCE.
Attribute.Name: Transaction_Violation_Reference_Key

Attribute.Description: The identifier for the additional reference value.
Attribute.Name: Reference_Name

Attribute.Description: Value of the additional reference.
Attribute.Name: Reference_Value

Attribute.Description: The reference to the rule that was violated.
Attribute.Name: Transaction_Violation_Key

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was created.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was last modified.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: User who created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: User who modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: Program that created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: Program that modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Entity.Description: Table for storing approver information for the violation.
Entity.Name: Transaction_Approver

Attribute.Description: Primary Key attribute of YFS_TRANSACTION_APPROVER.
Attribute.Name: Transaction_Approver_Key

Attribute.Description: The reference to the transaction that resulted in a violation
Attribute.Name: Transaction_Info_ID

Attribute.Description: Organization that is associated with the approval group.
Attribute.Name: Organization_Code

Attribute.Description: The User Group that can approve the violation.
Attribute.Name: Approver_User_Group_ID

Attribute.Description: The Team that can approve the violation.
Attribute.Name: Approver_User_Team

Attribute.Description: The UserID of the user that can approve the violation.
Attribute.Name: User_ID

Attribute.Description: The UserID of the delegate that has been assigned to approve the violation on behalf on the main UserID.
Attribute.Name: Delegate_User_ID

Attribute.Description: The reference to the Approval Group configuration.
Attribute.Name: Approver_Group_Key

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was created.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was last modified.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: User who created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: User who modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: Program that created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: Program that modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Entity.Description: Table for storing approver information for the violation.
Entity.Name: Transaction_Approval_Status

Attribute.Description: Primary Key attribute of YFS_TRANS_APPROVAL_STATUS.
Attribute.Name: Approval_Status_Key

Attribute.Description: The reference to the transaction violation.
Attribute.Name: Transaction_Violation_Key

Attribute.Description: The reference to the transaction approver.
Attribute.Name: Transaction_Approver_Key

Attribute.Description: The sequence of the approver.
Attribute.Name: Approver_Sequence

Attribute.Description: The UserID of the user who has approved or rejected the violation.
Attribute.Name: Approver_User_ID

Attribute.Description: Place Holder to capture comments entered by the approver.
Attribute.Name: Approver_Comments

Attribute.Description: The status of the approval.
Attribute.Name: Status

Attribute.Description: The sequence of the previous approver.
Attribute.Name: Previous_Approver_Sequence

Attribute.Description: Indicator to determine if approval is mandatory based on the signature policy of the validation definition.
Attribute.Name: Is_Mandatory

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was created.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was last modified.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: User who created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: User who modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: Program that created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: Program that modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid
